Customize your feed

How-to

Edit the variables below then click render to display an updated feed with your own configuration. For details on all of the configuration parameters and advanced documentation refer to the Feed component documentation here.

Variables

{{ name }} array ?
{{ name }} {{ typeof item }} ?
{{ name }}.{{ key }} {{ typeof item[key] }} ?{{ docs[name][key] }}

NYC Opportunity is the New York City Mayor's Office for Economic Opportunity. We are committed to sharing open source software that we use in our products. Feel free to ask questions and share feedback. Follow @nycopportunity on  Twitter,  Facebook,  Medium, and  Github.
